sentences.sContent: The children were balling up snow to make a snowman.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们正在把雪堆成球状，做一个雪人。

sentences.sContent: "He gave me a hug and a kiss and asked me where my snowman was," she said.
sentences.sCn: 黛比说：“他给了我一个拥抱和亲吻。 还问我的雪人在哪里。”

sentences.sContent: If you are wrong,the snowman with the correct answer will chill your heart.
sentences.sCn: 如果你是错误的，有正确答案的雪人将会使你的心脏变冷。

trans.tranOther: a simple figure of a person made of snow, made especially by children
